mapper.select: SELECT plcy_no, plcy_nm, plcy_expln_cn, biz_prd_bgng_ymd, biz_prd_end_ymd, aply_url_addr, sprvsn_inst_cd_nm, plcy_sprt_cn, plcy_aply_mthd_cn, sbmsn_dcmnt_cn, sprt_trgt_min_age, sprt_trgt_max_age, earn_min_amt, earn_max_amt, earn_etc_cn, add_aply_qlfc_cnd_cn, ptcp_prp_trgt_cn, ref_url_addr1, ref_url_addr2, oper_inst_cd_nm FROM YOUTH_POLICY WHERE plcy_no = #{plcyNo}
